meanings.definition: Making a soft, whispering or rustling sound.
meanings.sent1: The susurrating wind gently rustled the leaves in the trees.
meanings.sent2: The susurrating stream flowed quietly through the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The susurrating sound of the rain on the roof put me to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The susurrating branches of the willow tree danced in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The susurrating sound of the waves crashing on the shore was calming.

meanings.definition: To make a soft, whispering or rustling sound.
meanings.sent1: She could hear the leaves susurrating in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The river susurrating over the rocks was a soothing sound.
meanings.sent3: The cat was susurrating as it rubbed against my leg.
meanings.sent4: The wind susurrating through the grass whispered secrets to the field.
meanings.sent5: The curtains susurrating in the breeze created a peaceful atmosphere in the room.
